subject: Bespoke logging
msgSnippet: Hia, I d like to be able to write to the JUnit s output stream without calling an assert. Is there a method I can call that will do this?  I can t see
messageBody:
Hia,

I'd like to be able to write to the JUnit's output stream without calling an assert.

Is there a method I can call that will do this? I can't see anything.

My goal is to be able to write messages on tests that pass, as well as fail.

Thanks all.

David
